HOME.about: I'm a technician in administration of networked computer systems and also a self-trained programmer. I specialize in Full-Stack development, using React for the Front-End, Node.js and Spring Boot for the Back-End and SQL server, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB for the databases.
HOME.experience: I have experience as a software developer, working both in companies and on my own projects. I'm currently working as a Junior tester at Sopra Steria.
HOME.title: About me
